feature_model.name: Odoo requirements definition
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Odoo-SPL(_r) :g (_r_1) [1,*] : Sale(_r_1_2) : Purchase(_r_1_3) : Inventory(_r_1_4) : Accounting(_r_1_12) :m Product(_r_1_12_13) :m Analytic(_r_1_12_14) :m Portal(_r_1_12_15) :m Web-planner(_r_1_12_16) :m Base-setup(_r_1_12_17)
feature_model.constraints: constraint_6:~_r_1_4 or _r_1_12 constraint_4:~_r_1_2 or _r_1_12 constraint_5:~_r_1_3 or _r_1_12
